channel.title: radar on David Lilien
channel.description: Recent content in radar on David Lilien

item.title: Radar processing
item.description: I’ve been doing some work to bring the St. Olaf deep radar processor (StODeep) up into this decade. I’ve had some time twiddling my thumbs while running ice-flow models, and I’ve been doing the work of migrating StODeep as I wait for the model runs. I’m not a fan of Matlab, so I’ve migrated things to Python. I took advantage of some of the code I had written for pygssi, but really pygssi is now not very useful and things are migrating to the functionality and syntax of StODeep.
